original_text: When all the people with Adonijah heard Jonathan's report, they were very afraid. They got up from the feast and they ran away in different directions.
korean_text: 아도니야와 함께 한 손님들이 다 놀라 일어나 각기 갈 길로 간지라

sentences.original_text: When all the people with Adonijah heard Jonathan's report
sentences.korean_translation: 아도니야와 함께 있던 모든 사람들이 요나단의 보고를 들었을 때

sentences.original_text: They got up from the feast
and they ran away in different directions
